VIII.iv.2.A.1.d
.
Assumption That Forcible Detention Occurred in the Line of Duty
Assume that forcible detention or internment occurred in the line of duty unless there is affirmative evidence showing that it was the proximate result of the serviceperson’s own willful misconduct.
References
:  For more information on
the definition of
in the line of duty, see
38 CFR 3.1(m)
, and
willful misconduct
38 CFR 3.1(n)
procedures for willful misconduct and line-of-duty determinations, see
M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, 1.C
, and
the authority to assume FPOW status was incurred in the line of duty, see
38 CFR 3.1(y)(4)
.
